1.title: Which Celebrity Would You Vote For President?
1.plot: With Donald Trump winning the american presidency, we hit the streets to find out which celebrity could get you to vote for them. Is it The Rock? Tom Hanks? Oprah? Lady Gaga? Someone else? Who gets your vote for President of the United States?

2.title: Are You Excited For American Idol's Return?
2.plot: American Idol is officially coming back. So we decided to take it to the streets and find out if the people of Downtown L.A. are excited for its return. Even though Simon Cowell has said no to returning, and Ryan Seacrest is still on the fence, we got everybody's opinion on the idea of new judges and what it means for the show.

3.title: Rachel Lindsay and the New Season of the Bachelorette
3.plot: Rachel Lindsay is looking for love in the new season of The Bachelorette, so Kelly Russo took it the streets of Downtown L.A. to see what the people are thinking. Check it out and see which contestants are the most popular, and see who we think should get the final rose. Also, can we get a "WHABOOMB?"

4.title: The NBA Finals! Cleveland Cavaliers vs. Golden State Warriors
4.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew are back and this time, it's all about the NBA finals. We headed out to the Staples Center here in LA and asked people if they were cheering on LeBron James and the Cleveland Cavaliers or Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors. Take a peek at what everyone had to say.

5.title: Can You Define Millennial Slang?
5.plot: We're back and it's about to get #Lit. This week on DTLA Talks Kelly Russo takes it to the streets of downtown to see who can define all that slang those millennials are using these days. Watch it and let us know what you think. And remember - don't be #Basic.

6.title: Summer Bodies, Vacays, and Vibes
6.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew are back. And this time, it's all about summer. We take it to the streets and ask the people of DTLA if they're ready for summer and what they're doing to get their beach bodies ready. So grab towel and get ready for the heat.

7.title: Floyd Mayweather Versus Conor McGregor
7.plot: Let's get ready to Russo. Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew hit the streets of downtown Los Angeles to get the people's opinion about who's going to win in the upcoming, highly anticipated fight between Floyd Mayweather and Conor McGregor. What side of the ring are you on?

8.title: Best Dang 'Murica Trivia
8.plot: In honor of America's Independence Day, Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew takes it to the streets of Los Angeles to talk about America, her Trivia, and the good ole facts about the best country on Earth. Happy 4th of July.

9.title: How Do You Netflix and Chill?
9.plot: Wanna Netflix and Chill with Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew? Of course you do. So sit back and enjoy this episode as we ask the people of downtown Los Angeles this important question. Then, you should binge watch the rest of our episodes.

10.title: Comic-Con & Cosplay with Fanboy Brandon - Part 1
10.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew took a field trip to Yucaipa, California to bring you an exclusive look at the life of a Cosplayer. We met up with Fanboy Brandon and he gave us a tour of his home and talked to us about Comic-Con, cosplay, and everything in-between.

11.title: Comic-Con & Cosplay with Fanboy Brandon - Part 2
11.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew took a field trip to Yucaipa, California to bring you an exclusive look at the life of a Cosplayer. We met up with Fanboy Brandon and he talked to us about Comic-Con, cosplay, and everything in-between.

12.title: San Diego Comic-Con 2017, Game of Thrones, and Cosplay
12.plot: DTLA Talks is back - and this time we made the trip to San Diego for one of the biggest events of the year - Comic-Con. Kelly Russo and the crew talked to some of the cosplayers, checked out some pretty amazing costumes, and even attended the VIP Marked Men party aboard the Star of India.

13.title: What Would You Do for $5,000,000?
13.plot: Kelly Russo and DTLA Talks decided to see just how low people would go for money, so she took it to the streets to ask 'What Would You Do For $5,000,000'?

14.title: Crazy Conspiracy Theories
14.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew hits the streets of downtown LA once again to get people's thoughts on some of the craziest conspiracy theories out there. So what do you believe?

15.title: World's Hardest Tongue Twisters
15.plot: Think you got what it takes to tackle today's most terrifying tongue twisters? Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks teams hits the streets of downtown to see whose tongues got the magic touch.

16.title: The Best PB 'n J in Los Angeles
16.plot: Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew headed down to the world famous Grand Central Market to stop by the one-of-a-kind PBJ.LA restaurant to sample what is pretty much the best PB 'n J sandwich spot around. She sampled some of the food and even got to learn how to recreate this reimagined classic.

17.title: Angels Flight's Historic Re-Opening In Los Angeles
17.plot: Historic Angels Flight has re-opened in Los Angeles and Kelly Russo and crew were there to document the occasion. Los Angeles Mayor Eric Garcetti shared a few words with as as well as Richard Schave from the amazing Los Angeles history tour company Esotouric and even an appearance by the Cranky Preservationist.

18.title: Are You Ready for Some Football?
18.plot: It's that time of year again, so Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew hit the streets to see who's ready for some football. What's your favorite team?

19.title: Best Rapper Alive?
19.plot: Who is the best rapper alive? Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks team hits the streets to answer this hotly debated question.

20.title: Legalize It?
20.plot: Should we Legalize it? Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks team take it to the streets for answers to this hot button question.

21.title: Who Is Your Celebrity Crush?
21.plot: Do you or your significant other have a 'celebrity hall pass?' Do you have a crush on a celebrity? Is it Justin Bieber? Jennifer Lopez? Maybe Rihanna? Kelly Russo and the DTLA crew hit the streets of Downtown Los Angeles to find out.

22.title: What Was Your Childhood Fear?
22.plot: With the release of the scary clown film 'It' starring Bill Skarsgard as 'Pennywise,' Kelly Russo and crew hit the streets of Downtown Los Angeles to find out what were your childhood fears?

23.title: What Are You Doing For Halloween?
23.plot: What are you doing for Halloween this year? Are you getting dressed up? What's your costume? Are you going to a party? What's your favorite candy and how are your pumpkin carving skills? To find out, Kelly Russo and the DTLA crew hit the streets of Downtown Los Angeles again to find out what your plans are for Halloween.

24.title: Grand Central Market's 100th Anniversary
24.plot: If you know about Los Angeles, then you've definitely heard about Grand Central Market. Kelly Russo and the DTLA Talks crew headed over to the iconic spot in the heart of downtown to celebrate its 100th anniversary. Check out the video and see what Mayor Garcetti says when asked about his favorite restaurant.

25.title: The MOCA Los Angeles with Adrian Villar Rojas
25.plot: We're back. Kelly Russo and DTLA Talks crew headed over to the Geffen Contemporary at MOCA for an inside look at the work by Argentinian artist, Adrian Villar Rojas, whose show, The Theater of Disappearance, is currently being exhibited.

26.title: Chicas Tacos
26.plot: Kelly Russo and the Downtown LA Talks crew are back and this week we stopped by Chica's Tacos see what Chris Blanchard and his amazing crew have cooked up. You don't want miss these incredible and mouth watering Ensenada inspired dishes. We couldn't wait to dig in.

27.title: 20th Anniversary of The Pershing Square Holiday Ice Rink
27.plot: Tis' The Season and the 20th Anniversary of the Holiday Ice Rink at Pershing Square. We headed over to check it out and lace up our skates for an evening of pure fun.

imdb.title: DTLA Talks
plot: Follow Kelly Russo as we hit the streets of DTLA and Talk today's hot topics.
